attributes.action: Instruct the providers of the No. 10 petition server to pay one pound to users for each time a user sees " 503 service unavailable"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The frequency with which users see this message ("503 Service Unavailable") is unacceptable.

A non trivial financial incentive to perform well should concentrate the efforts of the contractor on providing a robust and reliable service. 

This E-petition system has the potential to be a powerful aid to the democratic process. It will fail if the current level of unavailability continues.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
